# ðŸ‘¹ Rascal Harmful

As the Rascal, you can die to the Sheriff and Snitch can find you if Snitch can find madmates.
Only assigned to Crewmates, cannot be assigned by the Merchant.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Rascals that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the Percentage that a Crewmate can receive Rascal
  • Appear As Madmate On Ejection
    • ON: the Rascal will appear the same way a Madmate appears when they get Ejected
    • OFF: Rascal will appear as they normally would

From: Idea & Coding: Loonie Toonsopen in new window
